home.title: Introducing the GDF Platform
home.text:
The GDF platform is a platform service that combines GDF Lab's innovative AI technologies.
The representative AI technology improves low-resolution frames to high-definition images
Technologies that can solve network problems through real-time streaming We have it.
This service allows users to use it conveniently
home.textBold: We started the GDF platform to share AI innovation.
home.subText:
Currently, PeekaView AI image and video services are available on the GDF platform
G-Enhancer and GDF Play are connected via external links.
We will try to open other services as soon as possible.

start.title: Get started
start.text:
Check the image or video that can represent the service on the main screen
Select the desired menu to use the service.
Of the menu image
start.textBold: You can move the white bar left or right to compare before and after using the service.

pikavue.title: Using Pikavue
pikavue.guide_text:
You can see the guide the first time you access the PeekaView AI Image, PeekaView AI Video menu.
Next to the Upload button
pikavue.guide_text_bold: You can revisit the guide at any time by clicking the Check out button.
pikavue.upload_text:
Click the Upload button and upload your image.
Use the prepared filters to your liking before final upload.
For more information
pikavue.upload_text_bold: Please refer to the guide below.
pikavue.delete_text: At the top left of the image or video list
pikavue.delete_text2:
Click
you can select the file you want to select.
pikavue.delete_text3:
You can select all files on a page by clicking the Select All button.
Select the files you want and click the Delete button to delete them.
